name: Land of Stocks
description:
Huge thanks to Shreyansh Agarwal and Kanishka Verma from my team for the awesome 3d and 2d designs!

This is a game made for a 36 hour hackathon, with the themes we took up being education and finance. You can trade stocks for small, everyday shops and it's meant to be a simplification of the system to teach people about the stock market.

Controls:

WASD or arrow keys to navigate around the map

Click on the name plate of a shop to open it's menu. You can buy, sell, or sell all your stocks on the board that pops up. You can close it using the X in the top right corner of each shop.

The stock prices change every day. You can skip to the next day by pressing enter.

Use the arrow in the bottom left corner of the screen to reset your progress. Your progress should be saved when you exit the game.

Use the buttons in the bottom right of the screen to exit the game or mute the music.

The source code of the game is available at https://github.com/IDoEverything/Land-Of-Stocks
